title: 106_s3139
content: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to repeal alien terrorist removal provisions . Entitles an alien in a removal proceeding to examine all evidence and admissibility records. Entitles an alien subject to arrest and detention for removal or deportation to non-federally provided counsel, and access to all evidence. Exempts an alien who is a lawful permanent resident, parolee, or asylee from the security and related removal provisions. Provides for transitional application of information access provisions to alien detainees and aliens seeking immigration benefits.
